SELECT proj.id as id, proj.name as name, prop.text_value as gateId FROM projects proj
JOIN resource_index ind ON ind.root_component_uuid=proj.uuid
LEFT JOIN properties prop ON prop.resource_id=proj.id AND prop.prop_key='sonar.qualitygate' AND prop.text_value LIKE #{query.gateId}
AND prop.text_value IS NOT NULL
AND prop.text_value IS NULL
AND ind.kee LIKE #{query.projectSearchSql}
AND proj.qualifier='TRK' AND proj.scope='PRJ'
AND ind.qualifier='TRK'
ORDER BY proj.name

SELECT text_value FROM properties
AND resource_id=#{componentId} AND prop_key='sonar.qualitygate'
